price: [It is as if] We have placed shackles around their necks up to their chins, so their heads are forced to remain up,
arabic: إِنَّا جَعَلۡنَا فِيٓ أَعۡنَٰقِهِمۡ أَغۡلَٰلٗا فَهِيَ إِلَى ٱلۡأَذۡقَانِ فَهُم مُّقۡمَحُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
